# The unconfigured ignition can be generated using
# infraenv.yaml, pull-secret.yaml, cluster-image-set.yaml
# and not using
# install-config.yaml and agent-config.yaml.

exec openshift-install agent create unconfigured-ignition --dir $WORK

exists $WORK/unconfigured-agent.ign
! exists $WORK/auth/kubeconfig
! exists $WORK/auth/kubeadmin-password
! ignitionContains unconfigured-agent.ign /etc/assisted/manifests/agent-cluster-install.yaml
! ignitionContains unconfigured-agent.ign /etc/assisted/manifests/cluster-deployment.yaml
igncmp unconfigured-agent.ign /etc/assisted/manifests/cluster-image-set.yaml expected/cluster-image-set.yaml
igncmp unconfigured-agent.ign /etc/assisted/manifests/infraenv.yaml expected/infraenv.yaml
igncmp unconfigured-agent.ign /etc/assisted/manifests/pull-secret.yaml expected/pull-secret.yaml

-- cluster-manifests/infraenv.yaml --
metadata:
  name: ostest
  namespace: cluster0
spec:
  cpuArchitecture: x86_64
  pullSecretRef:
    name: ostest-pull-secret
  sshAuthorizedKey: ssh-rsa 

-- cluster-manifests/pull-secret.yaml --
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: ostest-pull-secret
  namespace: cluster0
stringData:
  .dockerconfigjson: |-
    {
      "auths": {
        "quay.io": {
          "auth": "c3VwZXItc2VjcmV0Cg=="
        }
      }
    }

-- cluster-manifests/cluster-image-set.yaml --
metadata:
  name: cluster0-image-set
  namespace: cluster0
spec:
  releaseImage: registry.ci.openshift.org/origin/release:4.13

-- expected/cluster-image-set.yaml --
metadata:
  name: cluster0-image-set
  namespace: cluster0
spec:
  releaseImage: registry.ci.openshift.org/origin/release:4.13

-- expected/infraenv.yaml --
metadata:
  name: ostest
  namespace: cluster0
spec:
  cpuArchitecture: x86_64
  pullSecretRef:
    name: ostest-pull-secret
  sshAuthorizedKey: ssh-rsa 

-- expected/pull-secret.yaml --
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: ostest-pull-secret
  namespace: cluster0
stringData:
  .dockerconfigjson: |-
    {
      "auths": {
        "quay.io": {
          "auth": "c3VwZXItc2VjcmV0Cg=="
        }
      }
    }
